name: Cars Arena
description:
Meet Cars Arena - fabulous futuristic deathmatch action game with battle cars in far future.

In the arena of XXV century players can rule the greatest cars of the world and approve their champion, defeating enemies. Use different weapons, customize your car, explore the Arena to be the first of the winners and get the main reward - glory!
Everyone who come to this world, at any moment can call his friends to play in private game or find other players to fight with them.
Different types of weapons (machinegun, shotgun, lazer, railgun, gutlinggun and rocket launcher) and every weapon has alternate shooting mode.
Find the rage on the map and turn the game around making the champion of who was among the last in the match rating.

Find the opponents from 1 to 7, go to the Arena, find the best weapon (from machine gun to railgun), take the armor and win your opponents.

Cars Arena is evolving and we can't wait to present you a new content that will not take long: new game modes, cars, customization

Cars Arena is FFA shooter for 8 players.
